known_issues: Image was swapped in the website hero background instead of in the AVAIL — The Nexus Effect section; needs correction (replace Nexus Effect image with user-provided image and restore hero background image).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark-themed abstract tech/network illustration (avail-nexus-effect.dim_1600x900.png)

## Edit Images
- Restore the original hero background image content (1.png > 1.png)

existing_features.title: In the “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card within the Selected Signals section, replace the currently shown media (X embed/preview) with the user-provided image, and ensure only that AVAIL card is updated (no other sections).
Add the user-provided image as a static frontend asset (served from the frontend’s public assets) and reference it from the “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore the website Hero section background image to the original asset (undo the accidental replacement), so the Hero background is no longer the user-provided AVAIL image.
